A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Frigid fanboys are giving low ratings to The Last Jedi because their shitty theories weren't even taken into consideration. Oh well\, if I wanted to watch another "The Empire Strikes Back"\, definitely I'd watch "The Empire Strikes Back" and that's all.
Although some scenes seem odd\, the movie has a solid plot and the balance between the dark and light side of the force is thrilling.
Funny\, unpredictable\, risky\, and an unusual Star Wars movie that leaves behind the safe and conventional path. Loving this new turn of events.
Don't be afraid to embrace the new.
